Title: azure media services admin panel
Description: Simple azure media services dashboard. Upload media assets, queue encoder tasks and stream your audio\video assets.
HomeWiki:
UPDATE 10-15-2012: job output asset encryption fix (use 'decrypt' option for HLS tasks)

UPDATE 10-11-2012: app doesn't work correctly right now, see http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/MediaServices/thread/af0993a2-a4d5-4794-a86f-d9a5e30d2013# for details and updates.

Project Description

Simple admin panel for azure media services.

Feature list

- media asset management: create, delete, upload files




- job management: create, delete


- task preset management: create, edit, upload


-locator management: attach, delete

Install

  1. fill storageConfig section of the Web.config
  2. change user/password values of configuration/system.web/authentication/forms section
  3. create new Azure Website and publish project using VS2012 and publish profile
